text:
#Marseille clinical trial heralds coronavirus #Breakthrough 

Prof. Didier Raoult (@Pr_Raoult) reports successful test results from new #Coronavirus #treatment using #chloroquine (old anti-malaria drug) that he says can stop virus contagion in 6 days. 

https://t.co/h11GVF5gxW https://t.co/b9iEDTDvJy
